info.title: OpenTrusty API

post.description: Authenticate user and create a session

get.description: Retrieve details of the currently logged-in user

post.description: Register a new user in the current tenant

get.description: Checks if the service is up and running. Returns "pass", "fail", or "warn".
Returns the JSON Web Key Set for verify signing

post.description: Create a new platform tenant (Platform Admin Only)
Register a new OAuth2 client for the tenant

get.description: List all users and their roles in a tenant

post.description: Create a user and assign a role within a tenant
Assign a role to a user within a tenant

delete.description: Revoke a role from a user within a tenant

post.description: Update the password for the current user

get.description: Retrieve the profile of the current user
